verbs.description: Trump , for all his boasting about [V: sending] [ARG1: checks] [ARG2: to veterans groups] , has never served in the military .
Trump , for all his boasting about sending checks to veterans groups , [V: has] never served in the military .
[ARG0: Trump] , [ARGM-ADV: for all his boasting about sending checks to veterans groups] , has [ARGM-NEG: never] [V: served] [ARGM-LOC: in the military] .
